TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebException extends System.InvalidOperationException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type WebException = class inherit InvalidOperationException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 通过可插入协议访问网络期间发生错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while accessing the network through a pluggable protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引发的类继承自和实现可插入协议访问 Internet。The class is thrown by classes descended from and that implement pluggable protocols for accessing the Internet. 当引发的后代类，属性提供对应用程序的 Internet 响应。When is thrown by a descendant of the class, the property provides the Internet response to the application. **相关的提示****Associated Tips** **检查以确定请求失败的原因的异常的 Response 属性。****Check the Response property of the exception to determine why the request failed.** 如果 异常是由 类的派生类引发的，则 属性向应用程序提供 Internet 响应。When a exception is thrown by a descendent of the class, the property provides the Internet response to the application. **检查以确定请求失败的原因的异常的 Status 属性。****Check the Status property of the exception to determine why the request failed.** 异常的 属性提供错误的状态信息。The property of the exception provides status information for the error. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . **如果超时，当单步执行 XML Web 服务时，设置为无限的 XML Web 服务调用的超时值。****If you are timing out when stepping into an XML Web Service, set the timeout value for the XML Web Service call to infinite.** 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Error: Timeout While Debugging Web Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609)。For more information, see [Error: Timeout While Debugging Web Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609).

summary.span: 获取远程主机返回的响应。

span.span: Gets the response that the remote host returned.

value.span: 如果可从 Internet 资源获得响应，则为包含来自 Internet 资源的错误响应的 实例；否则为 。

span.span: If a response is available from the Internet resource, a instance that contains the error response from an Internet resource; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Internet 协议，如 HTTP，否则返回有效响应，指示在协议级别时出错。Some Internet protocols, such as HTTP, return otherwise valid responses indicating that an error has occurred at the protocol level. 当对 Internet 请求的响应指示出现错误时设置属性设置为，并提供，其中包含中的错误消息属性这是引发。When the response to an Internet request indicates an error, sets the property to and provides the that contains the error message in the property of the that was thrown. 应用程序可以检查来确定实际的错误。The application can examine the to determine the actual error. ## Examples 以下示例检查属性和输出到控制台并基础实例。The following example checks the property and prints to the console the and of the underlying instance. [!code-cpp[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/CPP/webexception_status_response.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/CS/webexception_status_response.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/VB/webexception_status_response.vb#1)]
